title: Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated, 1 Pack Mini Battery Powered Copper Wire Starry Fairy Lights for Bedroom, Christmas, Parties, Wedding, Centerpiece, Decoration (5m/16ft Warm White)
descriptions:
Introducing the Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated, a must-have for creating a magical ambiance in any space! This pack includes 1 set of mini battery-powered copper wire starry fairy lights, perfect for various occasions such as bedroom decor, Christmas festivities, parties, weddings, centerpieces, and general decoration.

With a length of 5m/16ft, these warm white fairy lights feature 50 rice grain-sized LED bulbs, providing a soft and enchanting glow. The 360-degree viewing angle ensures that every corner of your space is illuminated beautifully.

Crafted with high-quality copper wire, these lights are not only sturdy but also incredibly flexible, allowing you to shape and mold them effortlessly. The waterproof feature adds versatility, enabling you to use them both indoors and outdoors without any worries.

The battery box is clear and small, making it easy to hide and seamlessly blend with your decor. It requires 3 AA batteries (not included), ensuring long-lasting illumination throughout your events. Plus, the energy-efficient design ensures that your batteries last even longer.

One of the standout features of these fairy lights is their no heat emission, providing a safe and worry-free lighting experience. You can enjoy the captivating ambiance without any concerns.

Ariceleo also offers excellent after-sales service, so you can reach out to their professional customer service team for any assistance or returns via Amazon. Additionally, the product is backed by a convenient return policy.

Don't miss out on this opportunity to transform your space into a magical wonderland! Get your Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated now and let the enchantment begin.
